name: Brock

topics.response_text: I'm Brock, the bouncer. I take care of the troublemakers. You aren't going to be a troublemaker, are you?

topics.response_text: I can give you a history of every fight in this place, but a history of the city? I got nothing.

topics.topic_text: No, sir. I'm just here to drink and talk.
That depends. What makes a troublemaker?
topics.response_text: Starting fights, breaking stuff, stealing. Hmmm. I think I'll keep a close eye on you.

topics.topic_text: What is this I hear about the Hangar Deck and Upper Deck?
topics.response_text: Yeah, the folks on the Upper Deck think pretty highly of themselves. They think they're better than us.

description:
Brock is a 38 year-old African American Male.

Brock is a formidable bouncer working at the Muddy Rudder, Rivet City's premier establishment. Standing tall and muscular, he serves as Belle Bonny's right-hand man, ensuring order and safety within the bar. His intimidating presence alone is often enough to deter troublemakers, but when that fails, he doesn't hesitate to intervene.

Brock's Personality: Brock is a stoic and vigilant individual with a strong sense of duty. He takes his responsibility as a bouncer seriously and is quick to assess potential threats. Despite his tough exterior, he has a code of honor and doesn't use excessive force unless absolutely necessary. He is loyal to Belle Bonny and Rivet City, viewing himself as a protector of the community's peace.

Brock's Backstory: Born in the ruins of Washington D.C. before the establishment of Rivet City, Brock grew up in the harsh post-apocalyptic world. He lost his family to raiders when he was young, which instilled in him a deep-seated hatred for lawlessness and a desire to protect the innocent. He eventually found his way to Rivet City, where his imposing physique and natural protective instincts led him to become a bouncer at the Muddy Rudder under Belle Bonny's employ.
